text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Exciting news...We are up to 9th place in #CronaVirus testing per capita!! Not really America 1st but at least we are still 1st in most #Coronavirus cases & still 1st in deaths at now over 60,000. Can't wait till my state opens up monday without enough #PPE 😒
#MayThe4thBeWithUs
